uses: fractional reserve banking has, since the outset of western industrialization, initiated production for the purpose of trade and exchange.

Although the skill of sewing was pretty much a necessity about two hundred years ago, thanks to mass industrialization, clothing has become readily available in every price range.
definition: a process of social and economic change whereby a human society is transformed from a pre-industrial to an industrial state
